title: (x) YouTube "Broadcast Yourself" tagline - ITC Officina Sans {Lari}
content:
has anyone an idea which type is used for the youtube slogan

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo\_tagline\_sm.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018120950/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_tagline_sm.gif) | 3.72 KB |
author: jawbox

comments.content: You could try [Officina Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018120950/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=officina&image.x=0&image.y=0). The sample is quite small.

_You could try Officina Sans._

It is definitely Officina Sans. And i bet they never paid for a license.
